listitem.para: Whether or not to add network rules or routes for IPsec SA's to the respective VTI devices. When using "routing based VPNs" with a subnets policy of 0.0.0.0/0, this setting needs to set to &no; to prevent imploding the tunnel, and the administrator is expected to manually add ip rules and ip routes to configure what traffic must be encrypted. When set to &yes;, the _updown script will automatically route the leftsubnet/rightsubnet traffic into the VTI device specified with vti-interface
